citations.desc: Access and inspection of records and property; submission of itineraries.
citations.narrative:
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 12:05 PM on
08JUNE2022.
Inspector knocked on the door, yelled "Hello" twice by the animal area, called both cell phone numbers and left
messages, waited 35 minutes for licensee to return or return a phone call.
End Section

narrative:
2.126(b) 
   
Access and inspection of records and property; submission of itineraries. 
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 12:05 PM on 
08JUNE2022. 
Inspector knocked on the door, yelled "Hello" twice by the animal area, called both cell phone numbers and left 
messages, waited 35 minutes for licensee to return or return a phone call. 
 
 
 
End Section
